Title: Relates to establishing the New York state diplomas to home ownership program; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the New York state diplomas to homeownership assistance program; provides awards of up to fifteen thousand dollars to eligible applicants for repayment on student loans; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง679-k, Ed L; amd ยง2404, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the New York state diplomas to home ownership program; and making an appropriation therefor
